price: Lalle ne wannan* ita ce al'ummarku ta zama al'umma guda, kuma Nĩ ne Ubangijinku. Sai ku bauta Mini.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
footnotes: * Al'ummar Musulmi duka guda ce kõ da yake Annabãwansu sun zo dabam-dabam, a cikin lõkuta mãsu nĩSa tsakãninsu da harsuna dabam-dabam dõmin duk aƙĩdarsu guda ce a kan Ubangiji guda ne. Sa'an nan daga bãya waɗanda suka fita daga wannan aƙĩdar suka rarrabu ƙungiya-ƙungiya.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-uʿ'budūni
